医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现数千种药物组合与频繁调整剂量有关研究人员调查了多重用药的复杂性，以及医院环境中联合用药和药物对是否需要频繁调整剂量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-uncovers-thousands-of-medication-pairings-linked-to-frequent-dosage-adjustments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-uncovers-thousands-of-medication-pairings-linked-to-frequent-dosage- adjustmentments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daf4a82c-e2c1-418c-b280-c8e2fbd09250 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:57:00 -0400 Study uncovers thousands of medication pairings linked to frequent dosage adjustments
使用医用大麻的澳大利亚慢性病患者的整体健康相关生活质量有所改善患有慢性健康问题的澳大利亚患者服用医用大麻后，在使用的前三个月内，与健康相关的整体生活质量和疲劳程度显着改善，焦虑、抑郁和疼痛也得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Australian-病人-with-chronic-conditions-using-medical-cannabis-show-improvements-in-overall-health-lated-quality-of-life。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Australian-病人-with-chronic-conditions-using-medical-cannabis-show-improvements-in-overall-health-lated-quality-of-life。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c0bb40-932e-4bc3-969e-bbbe5338cfcd Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:53:11 -0400 Australian patients with chronic conditions using medical cannabis show improvements in overall health-related quality of life
研究揭示了对抗与年龄相关的免疫系统衰退的潜在解决方案随着年龄的增长，我们的身体面临着许多挑战，包括免疫系统功能下降和对各种健康问题的脆弱性增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-unveils-a-pottial-solution-to-combat-age-lated-immune-system-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-unveils-a-pottial-solution-to-combat-age-lated-immune-system-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ac4cc45-ea30-43c0-b039-e16794c9c9b9 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:47:00 -0400 Study unveils a potential solution to combat age-related immune system decline
Myriad Genetics 调查：女性对卵巢癌筛查普遍存在困惑和误解基因检测和精准医学领域的领导者 Myriad Genetics, Inc. 今天公布了新的全国性调查结果，表明大多数女性对卵巢癌筛查普遍存在困惑和误解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Myriad-Genetics-Survey-Women-have-widespread-confusion-and-misconceptions-about-ovarian-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Myriad-Genetics-Survey-Women-have-widespread-confusion-and-misconceptions-about-ovarian-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a06958d-fa12-4171-ba00-dac61de39925 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:42:00 -0400 Myriad Genetics survey: Women have widespread confusion and misconceptions about ovarian cancer screening
新测试可以利用脑脊液检测脑肿瘤约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心、约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院和其他四家机构的研究人员开发了一种分子测试，通过测量肿瘤脱落并在脑脊液 (CSF) 中循环的异常遗传物质来识别脑肿瘤的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-test-could-detect-brain-tumors-using-cerebrospinal-fluid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-test-could-detect-brain-tumors-using-cerebrospinal-fluid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3b30877-57d9-43c6-abb9-f7145a0aa1bd Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:39:40 -0400 New test could detect brain tumors using cerebrospinal fluid
补充维生素 C 和 D 可减少 AML 治疗并发症与既往接受过类似治疗但未接受这些补充剂的患者相比，在接受强化化疗时补充维生素 C 和 D 的急性髓系白血病 (AML) 患者的感染、出血和炎症等并发症发生率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Vitamin-C-and-D-supplementation-may-reduce-AML-treatment-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Vitamin-C-and-D-supplementation-may-reduce-AML-treatment-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67cf4e20-d8bd-4eba-9e91-b0add064bad8 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:35:13 -0400 Vitamin C and D supplementation may reduce AML treatment complications
“就像俄罗斯轮盘赌”：美国军方消防员努力应对 PFAS 暴露的未知数Kurt Rhodes 曾担任美国陆军消防员 32 年，他使用水成膜泡沫 (AFFF) 进行训练并履行职责。AFFF 是一种高效灭火剂，他从来不知道其中含有 PFAS 化学物质，而现在已知这些化学物质对人类健康有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/e28098Like-a-Russian-roulettee28099-US-military-firefighters-grapple-with-unknowns-of-PFAS-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/e28098Like-a-Russian-roulettee28099-US-military-firefighters-grapple-with-unknowns-of-PFAS-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b6c8a0e-1aa9-4819-92e9-4048cff64194 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:27:48 -0400 ‘Like a Russian roulette’: US military firefighters grapple with unknowns of PFAS exposure
与青少年饮食失调症状相关的网络欺凌受害和犯罪行为在一项针对美国青少年的研究中，网络欺凌的受害者和施暴者都比其他青少年更有可能出现饮食失调症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Cyber​​bullying-victimization-and-perpetration- Associated-with-eating-disorder-symptoms-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Cyber​​bullying-victimization-and-perpetration- Associated-with-eating-disorder-symptoms-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccec9085-84ec-4907-9e59-3666d24e5320 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:23:17 -0400 Cyberbullying victimization and perpetration associated with eating disorder symptoms in adolescents
儿童的“成长痛”可能表明偏头痛的存在或风险发表在《Headache》上的新研究表明，在儿童和青少年中，下肢疼痛（临床医生通常将其称为“生长痛”，通常归因于快速生长）可能表明存在偏头痛或有偏头痛的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Growing-pains-in-children-may-indicate-the-presence-or-risk-of-migraines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Growing-pains-in-children-may-indicate-the-presence-or-risk-of-migraines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dab9a71-c7b7-40c8-b7df-ceb60431c75c Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:17:59 -0400 'Growing pains' in children may indicate the presence or risk of migraines
研究显示，在家中的痴呆症患者可能会过量服用抗精神病药物《美国老年医学会杂志》上发表的新研究表明，在接受家庭医疗保健的阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症 (ADRD) 患者中，抗精神病药物的处方量可能过多且使用不当，而这种使用会导致患者预后较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Antipsychotics-are-likely-overprescribed-among-homebound-病人-with-dementia-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Antipsychotics-are-likely-overprescribed-among-homebound-病人-with-dementia-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2834aaa7-006c-4e76-a699-b5e3a19c834d Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:14:45 -0400 Antipsychotics are likely overprescribed among homebound patients with dementia, study shows
